website_summaries.verdict: Bluetooth-enabled speaker that is available in multiple colors and is larger than most wireless speakers.
pros: Wireless speaker that has LED lights to create a fun atmosphere
Can receive audio data either over Bluetooth, over NFC, or through a USB port with a thumb drive
Delivers a high level of bass for a bigger sound than you may expect
cons: More expensive than other speakers with similar features

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t like this speaker, we’re not friends
customer_reviews.text: It’s Perfect. Only thing I’m missing is owning a club.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B. Stamulis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a Sony quality, truly powerful party speaker. You don't have to worry about getting some weak speaker that claims to be 100 watts and sound like a tin can. This is Sony quality and sounds great outdoors. It also has a Bass feature that give speaker a lot more bump as well. This speaker works best if you download the app and run it thru there, very easy to download. Gives you many more options for the party light feature as well as a sound equalizer. This speaker is a little more expensive than the off brand speakers that sell around $100 but it's well worth it....
customer_reviews.author: Eddie M

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I listen to music every night. My little bose speaker was nice but when I'm outside it can't handle it. This speaker is way louder and might even have better sound quality. Definitely way more bass. The light feature is pretty cool. Bottom line is I love it and am looking to buy another to see how good two sound when paired.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: This unit is great untill it quit working two months out of warranty
customer_reviews.text: This unit is great untill it quit working two months out of warranty, no help from Sony. Two hundred dollars to repair, not a good deal
customer_reviews.author: kevin curtis

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I connect it to my TV's, Ipod, Ipad, phone, tablets, etc. I have used the Bluetooth capability and it works great. I have also used the RCA connections as well and they are great too. This sounds really good for what you get and I like the addition of the lights. It turns your living room into a club.
customer_reviews.author: BEE

customer_reviews.title: Beast mode!
customer_reviews.text: What beast ! I’m a Bose fan originally but this was on sale so I said hey why not ! Oh man this thing is awesome easy to connect super load with vocals and bass ! So far no distortion but time will tell . It’s a smooth looking speaker as well nice light features and can sit up and down as well connect to media devices such as TVs. Wow great speaker even has a remote ! I’m not disappointed its not portable as in a built in battery it’s way to big in my opinion to be carrying around from room to room anyways !
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Must have product!!!! 100% Satisfaction Guranteed!!
customer_reviews.text: Holyyyyyy ****!!!! Sony did a fantastic job on this product! Bass and sound quality is off the charts!!! Reviews on here don’t do justice for product. This product is a must have. Super loud Shook the walls on my double story house.. I will be purchasing another one
customer_reviews.author: Suki C

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this thing is great. It plays loud without getting distorted, has cool lightning effects that kids and young people love and it provides good overall sound quality. Our kids love dancing to music played through it, and even though it is big, it is still light enough to carry to any room in the house or outside in the backyard. Lots of fun for the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brightful

customer_reviews.title: You better get yours, I got mine!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker. I have been shopping around for a good one and I found it. I'll be ordering a second one to have my whole house rocking lol. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. This video doesn't do it justice ... Not even half volume and my floors are vibrating. Sounds is clear. Bluetooth works great. There are some medium reviews on this, which unless you're a professional DJ I don't understand at all. I'm going to throw a dope Halloween party with this thing 😂
customer_reviews.author: sk116

customer_reviews.title: An awesome product! I use the three I have for ...
customer_reviews.text: An awesome product! I use the three I have for a home theatre set up. The "extra bass" feature is awesome when you do or don't want that extra boom depending on what your listening or watching at the time. The more You get the better it sounds, really surprised about how well they flow together, the only inconvenience is that they could sync easier and stayed permanently synced once done so. Same with the remote, sense I have multiple sometimes one speaker won't pick up on when I'm turning up or down the volume etc.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: This stand alone speaker packs enough punch to blow you away !!
customer_reviews.text: This Audio Speaker is easy to set up or install as a wire connected speaker as well as a Bluetooth connection to a Bluetooth capable device with Amplified Power Output of 130 Watts on both left and right channels. It is an AC power only connection with batteries for the remote control . It's Illuminating lighting is entertaining along with my selections of my favorite music. I am very glad that I picked this speaker to play music from my computer as well as audio from my TV.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Collins

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Is it as good as some top end DJ speaker setup? No way. But does it hit well and is very sturdy? Yes! Does it have gimmicky lighting? Sure. But get a pair of these, and make a hell of a house party! Even one by itself is not bad at all. Sound is good, highs and lows do their best.. but it’s not a symphony or studio speaker. It’s a loud speaker with indoor usage as it’s intended use, so you get exactly that. And for that, I think it’s very good.
customer_reviews.author: Derek G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast, fills any room with deep sound, I have not found out how loud it gets, I'm kind of scared to.. it definitely rocks the whole house. The lights are very cool as well but I'm here for the sound and the simplicity of setup. I love this thing so much. If you are looking for a great speaker that quickly connects to your devices, and rocks the windows, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: problem with high capacity flash drives
customer_reviews.text: While this sound system has a crystal clear sound, the main issue I had with this system was that this system can not read high capacity flash drives. I bought a 128GB drive just for this purpose to put all my music on it. it was skipping some of the folders and play some. the flash drive was ok because I was able to play all the skipped folders in my laptop. however, no issues with my 8GB drive. if you are considering buying this system, beware of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best price for such an amazing speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought the GTK-XB5 and The GTK-XB7 and they are my favourite speakers ever. I am huge fan of bass and clarity. And these speakers bring that. They fuel a house party and even make the house vibrate. I fully recommend them for all types of music. I listen to everything from jazz and classical, to classic rock, EDM, RnB , drum and bass music. They have never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Benjie

customer_reviews.title: Deep bass and crazy durable
customer_reviews.text: Great big beast of a speaker . The bass is like a malestrom ! It has less clarity at max volume and the mids and highs drown out with the extra bass engaged . For a small garage speaker it cranks and easily moved and paired with any device . Much more durable than the jbl speaker . The sound is not as full as the Jbl but it is durable and good for a dusty shop. The lights and effects are cool if your 12 .
customer_reviews.author: Gerbilchild

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for about three weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two since the can connect to each other. I have had them to about three weeks and the conectivity of the the two speaker realy struggles. They will randomly disconnect and make weird stacis noise. They work great separately but together they dont work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Sony does a great job making their products with the highest quality and ...
customer_reviews.text: No other speaker compares to this one. Before buying this I had 3 speakers blow out, chords get pulled and broken etc... Sony does a great job making their products with the highest quality and almost impossible to blow out (I've never heard of one of these being blown out). I've had it for a few months now and it is insanely loud and has great base. Look past the price and buy this product because it will last a long time and save you money in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Good sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my girlfriends has this speaker. I loved the sound of her speaker. And at the time I had the small black Harmon Kardon. I love my Harmon, but the legs fell off on it and the sound wasn't as robust as this speaker. I had to have it. As soon as my Harmon died, I bought this. Best purchase so far. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Bug
customer_reviews.text: After a week of flawless use, the speaker doesn’t hook up to any Bluetooth connections. Doesn’t even show up on the Bluetooth menu. I tried resetting a few times, no luck. Pretty trash for a $300 speaker I’d say...
customer_reviews.author: Dana Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Good price good quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker. It looks good and it's sounds good. I use it for a projector which gives it a theater sound and when I have people over, I switch it to Bluetooth and it automatically connects to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bailey

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: my nephew had one, I liked it, so I bought one. Love it,, easy to use (bluetooth) great sound, loud/clear. the light show is pretty cool. I plan to buy another one so I can link them
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Potter

customer_reviews.title: This thing bumps hard.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing for anything really like my buddy and I set this thing up and turned the volume all the way up on cloud city and the floors upstairs were vibrating not even joking. Also dropped this from bed of my truck and it just bounced no damage other than little bit of dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker. Sound is great and the lights really make it feel like a party. It's expensive, but you are definitely getting what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has awesome color affects while powered on and a handy remote ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas present to have in the backyard during parties and get togethers. He has through the winter been using it indoors and this speaker blares out some music! It has awesome color affects while powered on and a handy remote as well. He absolutely loves this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect speaker for an apartment!! I bought this just over a year ago and am still impressed on how loud this thing can get!! Sound quality is great, even at high volume! The bass is awesome and the lights are perfect!! It’s not too heavy either so it’s easy to transport if needed!! The remote comes in handy too! Highly highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great and it also plays off of a flash drive
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't trade this for anything in the world. The sound is great and it also plays off of a flash drive.
customer_reviews.author: bestofthebest

customer_reviews.title: It has power and it looks great. Wish the lights didn't automatically come on
customer_reviews.text: It has power and it looks great. Wish the lights didn't automatically come on, but that is very minor. Very happy with the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is legit. I wish It would pair to my older versions of link-able Sony speakers, but for the sound quality, bluetooth range, kickass bass, light weight, and NFC, I'm still very pleased with my purchase. Note: purchased on sale for 100 bucks less than MSRP
customer_reviews.author: Kadin Oliva

customer_reviews.title: GREAT quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: GREAT quality for the price. So so happy with my purchase. We have used it numerous times since we received in mail. The "extra bass" feature is awesome :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: This thing jams. We use it out by our pool. We use it in the house. My house has speakers in the ceiling hooked to a whole house stereo. I use this along with my Ipod touch. The sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Olds72

customer_reviews.title: Buy 2 of these
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, amazing instrument for rock, jazz and even classical music, worth every penny. I got 2 of these and set up in stereo mode for that money it is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: MARYN

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the rechargeable battery powered speakers
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. Loud, lots of bass, lights are cool and remote is handy. Power cord is not too short. I have not had one issue with this speaker at all. No complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Nice boom box.
customer_reviews.text: We keep it in the kitchen and use it all the time. Has held up well and has perfect sound. Love the lights for ambiance. I recommend this Sony audio system.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: very powerful speaker
customer_reviews.text: awesome sound, the power helps when i am hosting a large gathering, love the bluetooth connection feature... hopefully the durability is just as good and will last for a long time
customer_reviews.author: HSB

customer_reviews.title: Incredible speakers for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly great investment. I see many celebrities on social media have these same exact speakers because they can literally rock your house and have colored strobe lights
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: This product would be great for a bedroom or small living room
customer_reviews.text: This product would be great for a bedroom or small living room, not so much for entertaining an outside party. For a large outside area this speaker is powerless, extra bass does very little. If you're looking for something powerful and loud, look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: D L Poston

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how quickly it arrived! Love the front door service! It's so much fun and I love all the colors!!
customer_reviews.author: brownamt

customer_reviews.title: The speaker is not wireless
customer_reviews.text: It was a sharp-looking speaker looks like made of quality materials but it lacked in sound quality highs and mids and volume as well. May be great if all you you listen to is dance music but if you are listening to all types of music light classical etcetera you would not be impressed with speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son and he absolutely loves this ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he absolutely loves this speaker. Tortures everyone on his dorm hall with it (and the bass).
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Utterly Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: My neighbors really enjoy being able to hear the music I play at my house. The sound is crisp, the bass is loud, and the lights are great feature. I've even used a single speaker to play music at a school dance in a gym and it was more than loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marcinko

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't consider it very portable but it is possible...
customer_reviews.text: Buy it!!!!!!you'll love it!!!I also have a beats speaker but the Sony is way better!!!!it also is a lil bigger but it's got HUGE sound!!!!very well built!!!you'll never regret it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, fast shipping, and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya G

customer_reviews.title: Not great for the size just ok
customer_reviews.text: Don’t have a timer for when to shut off or not. This thing will turn off quickly. Very annoying
customer_reviews.author: Yikorff21

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bass
customer_reviews.text: Love these I own two. Light show is great and bass is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Not too bassy
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had more bass, but it sounds great still!
customer_reviews.author: charger69o1.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bass on this & the Bluetooth connectivity is top notch. Really want to buy a second one so I can try the pair feature it says it has..
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Like 1989
customer_reviews.text: This thing kicks out mad sound and bass- brings me back to college days- if you like music -at high decibels- this is for you
customer_reviews.author: A.L. KD

customer_reviews.title: It is loud and great quality! We were thinking of buying a surround ...
customer_reviews.text: It is loud and great quality! We were thinking of buying a surround system for our patio but not any more. My husband is gonna do a built in to fit the speakers
customer_reviews.author: LetiLee

customer_reviews.title: Best sound I've had out of home audio
customer_reviews.text: Best sound I've had out of home audio. Thought it was portable as in has a battery but it does not. But very durable and good sound. Can only link with one device on blue tooth haven't been able to link to any other devices but one old phone I have
customer_reviews.author: Carl M.

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker  w a glitch pairing
customer_reviews.text: Big downfall. To pair them gotta be 3ft apart so you need to pair then use the other in an extension chord to walk w where you want to put it. . Called sony didn’t seem right it is
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. McGee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and portable. Would've gave it 5 stars if it allowed you to set the led light to one color... Other than that it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: If you're thinking about getting this, do it.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so... I thought about not getting this and going with a wired system for my basement. After reading the reviews, I pulled the trigger and got it. So glad I did. Created a hanger setup for it on my basement ceiling and it sounds so good, I'm getting a second to create a stereo effect.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Volume
customer_reviews.text: It discontrols the volume on cellphone. You can have the volume low on cellphone, but when you start the speaker, it starts loud.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Galvez

customer_reviews.title: best blutooth speaker eeeever
customer_reviews.text: I looooovee it!! I will buy again. It's super loud. It has dancing lights. Hooks up easy with my phone. Best gift to myself ever.
customer_reviews.author: LaChanda

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I purchase it for my son. The sound quality is great. He's very happy with it and the lights are nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality speaker for the money
customer_reviews.text: Sounds pretty damn good , gets super loud, bass is good, this things a beast for the money, with it had an aux in/out at least it has rca .
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Carr

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Kind of heavy it would be nice if you can roll it around. But the sound is great. You have to keep it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Jenette

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Trash dont buy it. Bluetooth rarly links up first try and the sound is poor. And its huge for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Disco biscuit

customer_reviews.title: A good buy indeed!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent, the remote control is good and the portability is good as well. My friends wanted to know where we got it, because they love how it displays and how it projects the sound very well. A good 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Marieta

customer_reviews.title: Portability
customer_reviews.text: The system sounds great I actually bought two and conect them together that was not too easy I don’t like that about itThey communicate to each other via Bluetooth and every time you turn on and off You actually disconnect older than that great product it sounds really good
customer_reviews.author: yordany rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Sounds GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This thing pumps some serious sound. Works great upright or horizontal. I listen to a lot of hip hop, rock and ol skool funk. The EXTRA BASS button make a big difference. Really happy with this speaker. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus A. Sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker , we had another one already and wanted a second one . Great sound !! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Libbie K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speakers I don't regret this purchase it arrived early also the sound Is next level and i will be using it for all my audio setups now!

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and good price.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds terrific. Very easy to pair with your iPhone or your iPad. I’m very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: lots of base
customer_reviews.text: after owning this speaker for a while now i am super impressed with the base . KInda sucks that it has to be plugged in but its very loud.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I now have bought six for myself and gifts. They are awesome alone or pair in stereo. Huge sound!

customer_reviews.text: Great sound, unexpected. easily connects to all my bluetooth devices thanks for giving me a great value.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Speaker sounds great. But re-pairing every hour is getting old. Don't know if I'd buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Makes you want to dance
customer_reviews.text: This boom box has all the sound you will need. We use it on our houseboat when we have parties and it makes people just want to dance!

customer_reviews.title: Rocks the party
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for someone who really loves music and it is as described and powerful

customer_reviews.text: the sound is awesome! One is more that great but, 2 is terrific! Apps to download for controlling the the speakers and lighting effects too.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, less than ideal pairing modes
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the first one so much that I bought a second. I would give it 5 stars but for the pain of pairing them up in stereo mode every time I turn them on. It's an exercise in patience as you go back and forth trying to get them paired.

customer_reviews.title: Actual good quality blue tooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: These are really killer sub boxes have a 1000 watt rca home theater system and this kills that

customer_reviews.title: Easy instructions
customer_reviews.text: Why is it so hard to get products with operating manual this comes with good manual in English remote and batteries ( I'm easy to satisfy)

customer_reviews.title: Loud bass
customer_reviews.text: This thing pounds. Shakes the floor. I was surprised. I have already talked 3 friends into getting one.

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite speaker! I have high end equipment like Martin ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite speaker! I have high end equipment like Martin Logan, but every Friday by the fire pit, are my friends, myself and Otis! Yes I named it Otis and bought four more for my friends.

customer_reviews.title: Boom! boom!  boom!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Used for outside party and blew the guests away with it's sound. Best buy even maybe :)

customer_reviews.title: Great bass for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yr old son loves it. Perfect for his room. He has 2 and connected them together.

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing! It jams and sounds amazing, and when you turn the extra bass on it really bumps! I highly recommend this product! Well worth the money!

customer_reviews.text: The one purchased was previously owned but in great condition! My son loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Shakes your chest harder than a massage chair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this menace of a speaker, for the price I cannot think of a better speaker to have. I use this speaker for 80+ person parties at an apartment and it shakes the whole building, and neighbors ask us to turn it down! All and all, I am impressed by this speaker!

customer_reviews.title: Light wont stay off
customer_reviews.text: You have to constanly use the remote to shut the lights off on standby or when it is on. They just won't stay off off.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Meets my expectations
customer_reviews.text: It meets my expectations. It’s loud and easy to connect to Bluetooth devices. It can be use outdoor and indoor. I can’t connect it to my Bluetooth TV because my tv is Samsung and it’s not compatible with Sony
customer_reviews.author: Ovie Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Very clean sound with great bass too!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great! This is my second one I have purchased. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Cook

customer_reviews.title: Sound is superior
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. I watch my whole family dancing around when we play this thing. Sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great bass, ok sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for the perfect semi portable Bluetooth speaker for a long time and still have yet to find it. Most speakers that I've tried out have had good crisp sound quality, but lacked in bass when turning the volume all the way up. I would hear rattling noises from the lack bass. This speaker solves that problem, but then lacks in sound quality, it's not bad at all, but not perfect either... I guess you can't have both at this price point...
customer_reviews.author: Ethan L.

customer_reviews.title: big problems with bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I bought this speaker 1 year ago. It still under warranty, the bluetooth is not working, please contact me as soon as you can, my email is facuboero@hotmail.com. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth
customer_reviews.text: Sound Quality is fine it's just that I hear more bass than voice sound. I like the led strips on it.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bass
customer_reviews.text: Honestly love this thing is worth every penny although the controller feels a little gimmicky.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Stephens

product_meta.title: Sony GTKXB7LC High Power Home Audio System with Bluetooth
product_meta.description: Style:GTK-XB7| Color:BlueBring the night alive with this EXTRA BASS wireless Bluetooth and NFC speaker system that pumps up any gathering with deep, punching bass, club-like LED lighting and DJ effects. Stream and control great sounding music from your smartphone and even add extra wireless speakers to the mix. It’s ready to hit the party scene with bass that hits.
feature_bullets: Extra Bass adds power to every bass line, Seamless streaming with NFC and Bluetooth, LED lights create a party atmosphere
Two-way design for flexible setup, Party Chain lets you expand your speaker system, Audio input and output;Tuner :Yes
USB port lets you plug in and play, ClearAudio+ enriches your music, Customize your settings with the SongPal app
Runs on AC power only. The remote control uses 2 AAA batteries. Easy Bluetooth connectivity with NFCOne-touch
This system can receive data in the AAC or LDAC codec format from a Bluetooth device

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars459 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
